import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const API_URL='https://collective-app-2.herokuapp.com' export default function Signup() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(undefined) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const requestBody = { email, password, name } axios.post(`/api/auth/signup`, requestBody) .then(response => { navigate('/login') }) .catch(err => { const errorDescription = err.response.data.message setErrorMessage(errorDescription) }) } const handleEmail = e => setEmail(e.target.value) const handleName = e => setName(e.target.value) const handlePassword = e => setPassword(e.target.value) return ( <>

Signup

{errorMessage}
}
Already have an Account?Login
) }
